title: The Rules
description:
'At A Theater Near Me' has begun with Chris setting all the ground rules (00:15:30). Jared Carrabis is currently a free agent and it doesn't sound like much progress is being made (00:01:00). Magnolia, MS has a tentative weekend (and possible nuptials) planned out (01:56:10). Deadspin announces 'Idiots of the Year' and Kevin Clancy makes the list. Betty White, John Madden & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
